name: Treasure Island
storyline:
The year is 2003. Strange rumors have surfaced about odd occurrences regarding Disney's abandoned Discovery Island. Combined with the attraction's already sordid past, a small group of people is commissioned to investigate the validity of these rumors and hopefully lay them to rest. However, something has gone horribly wrong.
In a vain attempt to recoup their losses, one last intern is sent to the island to pick up the pieces of their research and recover what they can, but it quickly becomes apparent that this island is far from abandoned.
summary: "If you really believe in something, it can be yours."
